description: This table stores mappings from the Epic-defined ethnicity values to the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) defined ethnicity values as specified in the OMB Ethnicity Mapping Configuration of system definitions.

columns.name: FAC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the facility record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: OMB_ETHNICITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Office of Management and Budget (OMB) ethnicity category ID for the OMB Ethnicity Mapping Configuration in system definitions.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Hispanic/Latino


Not Hispanic/Latino


Asked but No Answer


Unknown
